meanings.definition: Having a strong smell or scent.
meanings.sent1: The flowers in the garden were so odorousness, filling the air with their sweet fragrance.
meanings.sent2: The bakery was filled with the odorousness of freshly baked bread.
meanings.sent3: The odorousness of the garbage can made the raccoon wrinkle its nose in disgust.
meanings.sent4: The odorousness of the perfume lingered in the room long after she had left.
meanings.sent5: The skunk's odorousness was unmistakable, even from a distance.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of having a distinctive odor.
meanings.sent1: The odorousness of the cheese was overpowering, but some people loved it.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with the odorousness of the incense burning in the corner.
meanings.sent3: The dog's odorousness was so strong that even the cat kept its distance.
meanings.sent4: The odorousness of the old books in the library brought back memories of childhood.
meanings.sent5: The odorousness of the garbage truck made everyone hold their breath as it passed by.
